Html:
Hello,

I've studied Oxite for a while.

There's a problem that I can't understand.

How the controller been create??

Who pass the services to the controllers??

And where you guys define those things??

I can't find it anywhere, the only thing I found is OxiteControllerFactory.GetControllerInstance.

But I can't see how to do those actions.

Can anyone tell me??

Thanks

River

OK,

I've found the answer,

It's a function of unity.

I think I have to work hard with unity.

Thanks
